title: Sunday lunch…
content:
A lovely day today… a walk through [Petts Wood](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107204958/http:/www.nationaltrust.org.uk/main/w-global/w-localtoyou/w-south_east/w-south_east-places/w-south_east-places-north_kent/w-south_east-places-north_kent-hawkwood_petts_wood.htm)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107204958im_/http:/typophile.com/files/trunk.jpg)
  
 to the [Bull's Head](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107204958/http:/www.youngs.co.uk/pubprofile.aspx?locationID=&AtmosphereID=&FoodID=&OccasionID=&pubid=47)  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107204958im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bulls-head-chiselhurst-larg.jpg)
 for pint or two of [Winter Warmer](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107204958/http:/www.youngs.co.uk/pubprofile.aspx?locationID=&AtmosphereID=&FoodID=&OccasionID=&pubid=47)
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107204958im_/http:/typophile.com/files/winter_warmer_new2.gif)
and then ride home on a bus, looking at this  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107204958im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sign.jpg)
author: Richard Hards
